info.description:
BookingAPI covers the complete booking process.
It allows generating lists of hotels, confirming bookings, getting lists of bookings,
making cancellations and obtaining booking information.
info.title: Hotel Booking API

post.description: Returns the descriptions of the comments associated with the hotel request from ATLAS+

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of fields to be received in the response. If nothing is specified, the accommodation type code is returned. To retrieve all the fields use ‘all’. See the complete list of available fields in the response.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code for the language in which you want the descriptions to be returned. If the language is not specified, English is the default language.

parameters.name: useSecondaryLanguage
parameters.description: Specify "True" if you want to receive the descriptions in English if the description is not available in the language requested. Specify "False" (default value) if you do not want to receive the description in English if the language requested is not available.

get.description: Returns the list of available facilities.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of fields to be received in the response. If nothing is specified, the accommodation type code is returned. To retrieve all the fields use ‘all’. See the complete list of available fields in the response.

parameters.name: lastUpdateTime
parameters.description: Specifying this parameter limits the results to those modified or added after the date specified. The required format is YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code for the language in which you want the descriptions to be returned. If the language is not specified, English is the default language.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The number of the initial record to receive. If nothing is specified, 1 is the default value.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The number of the final record to receive. If nothing is indicated, 100 is the default value.

parameters.name: useSecondaryLanguage
parameters.description: Specify "True" if you want to receive the descriptions in English if the description is not available in the language requested. Specify "False" (default value) if you do not want to receive the description in English if the language requested is not available.

post.description:
This method is used to request room availability. Some filters and special features can be applied before sending an availability request.

A flexible date search allows customers to retrieve available rates for a specified number of days prior to and post check-in.

The response generated is a list of hotels with the different room types, board types, and rates available for those hotels, but not only restricted to the dates selected.

BookingAPI prices are final. Our rates include supplements and discounts and no additional price calculations are required.

It can also return cancellation fees in the availability response, providing amounts and dates at the first step of the booking.

rooms.name: Double or Twin SIDE SEA VIEW
Double or Twin SUPERIOR FRONT  SEA VIEW

error.message: Invalid data. Error at property stay: Check-in must be in the future.

examples.application/xml: INVALID_DATA-971f02ec-e52d-4306-8b8b-2d0d6fc21ebf Invalid data. Error at property stay: Check-in must be in the future.

get.description:
CheckRate is an optional operation used to assess and valuate the rate before the actual booking. CheckRate returns the same information as the Availability response for a hotel rate with up-to-date price, along with additional information regarding the rate: rate breakdown, rate comments and upselling options

The CheckRate method can complement the booking process, as it returns additional information to the availability request. However, when the rateType value is "RECHECK", the CheckRate method is mandatory.

Besides the details for the rate, CheckRate has the option to also return information of higher rates of the same hotel being checked. This is called Upselling.
Upselling returns additional room options, each with its own rate key, allowing you to upgrade the stay quality in room category and rate plan even after the CheckRate operation has been performed.

parameters.name: rateKey
parameters.description: Room rateKey returned in the availabilityRS with all the information needed to obtain rate details and to confirm the booking

parameters.name: upselling
parameters.description: Parameter to add or remove the upselling options node to the response.

post.description:
CheckRate is an optional operation used to assess and valuate the rate before the actual booking. CheckRate returns the same information as the Availability response for a hotel rate with up-to-date price, along with additional information regarding the rate: rate breakdown, rate comments and upselling options

The CheckRate method can complement the booking process, as it returns additional information to the availability request. However, when the rateType value is "RECHECK", the CheckRate method is mandatory.

Besides the details for the rate, CheckRate has the option to also return information of higher rates of the same hotel being checked. This is called Upselling.
Upselling returns additional room options, each with its own rate key, allowing you to upgrade the stay quality in room category and rate plan even after the CheckRate operation has been performed.

get.description:
The booking list operation returns a list of bookings based on the search criteria.

The most important information returned for each booking in the list is: * Booking reference * Booking holder * Booking paxes * Hotel, rooms and boards confirmed * Booking rates

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Range of dates where the method will look for bookings, lowest value.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Range of dates where the method will look for bookings, highest value.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Range of bookings to be returned, lowest value

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Range of bookings to be returned, highest value

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The parameter is used to get all bookings, including or excluding cancelled bookings

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Parameter to filter the results by the country of the hotel. Can include multiple values separated by commas

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Parameter to filter the results by the destination of the hotel. Can include multiple values separated by commas

parameters.name: hotel
parameters.description: Parameter to filter the results by the hotels reserved in the bookings. Can include multiple values separated by commas

parameters.name: clientReference
parameters.description: Parameter to filter the result by the client reference of the booking.

parameters.name: filterType
parameters.description: This parameter is used to identify wether the bookings list is filtered by check-in date or by booking creation date.

parameters.name: extend
parameters.description: Extends the information that is shown for each booking, to include tax breakdown, commission, remarks and/or cancellationReference (if applicable).

post.description:
The Booking operation requests a reservation confirmation for the specified ratekey or ratekeys.
BookingAPI does not support on-request confirmations: All confirmations are instant confirmations.

get.description: The BookingDetail operation allows to retrieve a booking with all its details from the booking reference locator.

parameters.name: bookingId
parameters.description: Booking reference number taken from the confirmation response or from the booking list function. Format: XXX-YYYYYY

put.description:
The BookingChange operation is used to change or update different values of a booking.

The changes that can be performed are:

• Change clientReference • Change booking remarks • Change booking holder name • Change booking holder surname • Change checkIn date • Change checkOut date • Change board plans • Change passengers name • Change passengers surname • Add rooms to a booking • Remove rooms from a booking (partial cancellation)

delete.description:
BookingCancellation is used either to simulate a booking or to perform the actual cancellation.
Cancellations always take into account day and time of the destination in order to calculate what cancellation policy should be apply.

parameters.name: bookingId
parameters.description: Booking reference number taken from the confirmation response or from the booking list function. Format: XXX-YYYYYY

parameters.name: cancellationFlag
parameters.description: Type of cancellation method to be used.

remark.example: Booking remarks are to be written here.

ApiBooking.description: The Booking object. Contains all data related with the booking itself.

apiError.description: The ERROR object. It is only returned when there's an error. It includes the echo token for debugging purposes.

message.example: Invalid data. Error at property stay: Check-in must be in the future.
